content: DX 6-GR Powder-actuated grating nailer Fully automatic powder-actuated nailer for fastening grating and diamond plate ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster – up to 120 grating fastenings per hour by one user Higher productivity – automatic piston return and cartridge advancement equip you to work up to 5 times faster than alternative fastening methods One-step energy level setting – expanded on-tool power adjustment means you can use a single cartridge color for many fastenings Easy to operate – precise control helps to deliver consistent, more accurate fastening On-board display – shows when your nailer needs cleaning or maintenance Applications Fastening gratings to steel structures Fastening diamond plates to steel structures ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 19.3 x 2.7 x 7.5 in Weight: 7.5 lb. Fastener Intake: Threaded stud Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 19.3 x 2.7 x 7.5 in | Weight | 7.5 lb | Fastener Intake | Threaded stud | Fastener length range | 0.98 - 1.57 in | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | No | Power (max.) | 335 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-6-5-PGR ### ITEMS- 2229024 - Powder-actuated tool DX 6 GR - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 6_01 NFC Basic unit - 1x X-6-5-PGR Piston assy - 1x X-6-FGR Fastener guide assy - 1x DX 6 Cleaning kit - 1x DX 6 XS Tool case
